title: Judge reinstates personnel board member fired by Trump
shortDescription: A federal judge reinstated a member of a personnel dispute board fired by the Trump administration, revealing a clash with Congress over personnel.

title: Trump DOD pick says military force an option to prevent nuclear Iran
shortDescription: Elbridge Colby told a Senate hearing that preventing Iran’s nuclear ambitions could require using US bombers and air tankers to attack Iran’s facilities.

title: Republican lawmaker introduces bill to put Donald Trump on $100 bill
shortDescription: Rep. Brandon Gill introduced a bill requiring all $100 bills to feature a picture of Donald Trump on the front face of the note.

title: Trudeau calls Trump tariffs 'dumb thing to do'
shortDescription: "We don't want this." Prime Minister Justin Trudeau placed blame for a trade war between the U.S. and Canada squarely on the Trump administration.

title: 'Trust in Trump': President's supporters dismiss alarm bells
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's voters are upholding their confidence in his controversial actions even as some await moves on his populist economic promises

title: Trump will address America. Democrats are preparing their responses.
shortDescription: While some say they are prepared to ditch the event altogether, many on the left are planning to use Tuesday's stage to counter Trump.

title: 'Time to make things right': Zelenskyy says he's ready to work with Trump
shortDescription: Zelenskyy said in a social media post that it is "time to make things right" with the Trump and his administration after the Oval Office fight last week.

title: President Trump to address joint session of Congress: Live updates
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will use his remarks before a joint session of Congress to spell out his vision for the next four years.

title: President Trump pauses aid to Ukraine
shortDescription: World leaders are reacting to President Donald Trump's decision to pause federal aid to Ukraine.

title: Could a GOP bill stop some married women from voting?
shortDescription: The proposed SAVE Act, designed to keep immigrants from voting, is raising concerns among some women who took husband's last name.

title: What time is Trump's address tonight? How to watch, stream

shortDescription: As he gives his first joint address to Congress, President Trump will face a nation turning skeptical about his handling of the economy and inflation.

title: Democrats: Trump federal workforce purge helps Elon Musk's businesses
shortDescription: The South African businessman has been spearheading Trump's efforts to slim down the federal workforce.

title: Trump to address Congress, nation. What to expect from his speech.

title: 'We'll fight to the bitter end': China and Canada hit back at Trump tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's tariff actions, which could upend nearly $2.2 trillion in two-way annual U.S. trade, went live on Tuesday.

title: Trump pauses military aid to Ukraine after Oval Office clash

title: 'We want to sound the alarm' Activists host program to counter Trump

title: Polish Cold War hero shares 'horror' at Trump's treatment of Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Nobel Peace Prize-winner Lech Walesa posted the letter, which was signed by 39 Polish former political prisoners, on Facebook on Monday.

title: Trump administration gave schools DEI ultimatum – then walked it back
shortDescription: The Trump administration gave schools two weeks to comply with a broad anti-DEI order. After the deadline, the Education Department walked it back.

title: Inmate sent to Oklahoma for execution in wake of Donald Trump's order
shortDescription: Hanson arrived in Oklahoma to face a likely execution by the state for his murder conviction. The Biden administration previously blocked the move.

title: Trump pick Linda McMahon confirmed by Senate to lead Education Dept.
shortDescription: The GOP-controlled Senate approved former wrestling industry executive Linda McMahon as the next secretary of the Education Department.

title: Fired federal workers to join Democrats at Trump's speech to Congress
shortDescription: Democrats are being asked to bring guests to Trump's Tuesday speech who have been harmed by the president's first weeks in office.
